summary: Integrate full ritual telemetry suite into Toyfoundry quilt and deliver composite roll-up.

directives.details: Extend the telemetry quilt scaffold to ingest Forge, Parade, Purge, and Promote ritual logs alongside existing mint telemetry.
Define schema fragments for each ritual and ensure the loom can normalize key metrics (batch ids, timestamps, outcome flags) before stitching.
Upgrade `tools/telemetry/quilt_loom.py` (or successor) to build a composite roll-up keyed by Alfa operation, referencing all ritual contributions.
Run the enhanced loom against current telemetry and deposit `quilt_rollup_all.json` alongside the existing Alfa roll-up.
Submit acknowledgement and factory report capturing integration status, coverage across rituals, and follow-on telemetry asks.
